files.patch:
@@ -27,1 +27,1 @@
- * @summary Test that And nodes are added to the CCP worklist if they have a constant as input.
+ * @summary Test that And nodes are monotonic and added to the CCP worklist if they have a constant as input.
@@ -29,0 +29,1 @@
+ * @run main/othervm -XX:+UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions -XX:RepeatCompilation=300 -XX:+StressIGVN -XX:+StressCCP -Xcomp -XX:CompileOnly=java.lang.Integer::parseInt compiler.ccp.TestAndConZeroCCP
@@ -41,0 +42,1 @@
+        Integer.parseInt("1");

@@ -1,38 +0,0 @@

-/*
- * @test
- * @bug 8350563
- * @summary Test we don't prematurely optimize and later unoptimize unprocessed nodes.
- * @run main/othervm -XX:+UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions -XX:RepeatCompilation=300 -XX:+StressIGVN -XX:+StressCCP -Xcomp -XX:CompileOnly=java.lang.Integer::parseInt compiler.ccp.TestAndConZeroMonotonic
- * @run main compiler.ccp.TestAndConZeroMonotonic
- */
-package compiler.ccp;
-
-public class TestAndConZeroMonotonic {
-
-    public static void main(String[] args) {
-        // test flags compile j.l.Integer
-    }
-}
